title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: void Basic concepts of AI, production systems and AI, search strategies for AI, search strategies for decomposable production systems, predicate calculus, knowledge representation, semantic nets, frames, conceptual dependency, planning, planning as search, plan generation, game theory.
